Description: Wheel-made black glazed pottery lamp with rounded walls, a raised rim and a short tapering nozzle. Glossy metallic black glaze. Fine orange fabric.
Curator's comments: Parallel from Athens (Howland 1958, Type 21A, no. 149). Howland, R.H. 1958. The Athenian Agora, IV, Greek lamps and their survivals. Princeton
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q22)
Walters 1914 / Catalogue of Greek and Roman Lamps in the British Museum (176)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (KC.33) (Phase 1)
